---
title: "Random Walk"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
x = NULL
x[1] = 0
for (i in 2:1000) {
  x[i] = x[i-1] + rnorm(1)
}

random_walk = ts(x)
plot(random_walk, main='Random Walk')
```
```{r}
acf(random_walk)
```
```{r}
random_walk.diff = diff(random_walk)
plot(random_walk.diff)
```
```{r}
acf(random_walk.diff)
```
